resources.string: Add scriptures or quotes from the Gospel Library app by using the \"Share Annotation\" feature.
How to Add Scriptures or Quotes from the LDS Gospel Library app

While in the Gospel Library app highlight some text and click the additional options menu button (3 dots aligned vertically) located in the bottom right corner. Select the \"Share Annotation\" feature.\n

On the next screen select the Talk Tool app. Once you are in the app then make sure everything is filled out the way you want before clicking the button to add your entry to the quote or scripture list. 

Note: If you push one of the plus buttons on the scriptures or quotes page then you will be taken to the tutorial page that has a video showing this process. This page also gives you the option to manually enter in a scripture or quote.
How to Add Quotes from the LDS Scripture Citation Index app

While in the Citation Index app highlight some text and click the share button (Circle with two lines coming from it) located on the top menu bar. Choose the Talk Tool app from the list. Once you are in the app then make sure everything is filled out the way you want before clicking the button to add your entry to the quote list. \n
To delete all entries and notes from the app select the \"Delete all\" feature from the options menu (3 dots aligned vertically) located on the menu bar on the main screen.\n
To delete a single item from the scripture or quote list press and hold an item in the list. This will bring up an action bar which will give you the option of deleting one or several items.\n
To export your notes, scriptures and quotes from the app select the \"Export data\" feature from the options menu (3 dots aligned vertically) located on the menu bar on the main screen.\n
Select an email service to use and then once you are in the email application send the email to yourself. You will then have access to all of your content on your computer.

Talk Tool is an app that helps you organize ideas, scriptures, and quotes for a talk or Sunday School lesson. 

This app has adapted code from the LDS Ponderizer app by Dan Mercer.
